alert.note: Alert for Borden; Howard; Mitchell; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 30 at 10:31PM CDT until July 01 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR EASTERN BORDEN, NORTHEASTERN HOWARD, MITCHELL AND SCURRY COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CDT, emergency management reported flooding across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Snyder, Colorado City, Loraine, Colorado City Airport, J B Thomas Reservoir, Lake Colorado City, Lake Colorado City State Park, Inadale, Champion Creek Reservoir, Fluvanna, Westbrook, Ira, Dunn, Cuthbert, Buford, Winston Field, Knapp, Randalls Corner, Hermleigh and Vincent. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
